data.system_settings: Windows Pro 1009 x64 and iPhone 6 iOS 10.2.1
data.actual_result: You stay in both voice channels while being able to hear and speak, you also show in both voice channels
data.expected_result: You get disconnected from the first device you connected
data.short_description: You can join 2 voice channels at the same time
data.steps_to_repro: - open discord in 2 different devices with the same account - join a voice channel with one of your device - join another voice channel in another guild with the other device - observe
